question_text: Expect five contacts this week, on Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Sunday.
In this contact, you will be asked up to five questions. Please check the answers that best describe your oral health behavior.
Overall, the smart toothbrush was easy to use.
Overall, the smart toothbrush was a nuisance.
Overall, the smart toothbrush was enjoyable to use.
I feel that good oral hygiene is attractive and appealing in social contexts.
I feel that using the ROBAS will make me feel more self-confident about my oral hygiene in social situations.
Thank you for answering this Survey. Please click "FINISH".
